alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Baca and eastern Las Animas Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Higbee to 12 miles northeast of Kim to 11 miles north of Kenton. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pritchett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
